name: Scotch Egg Sauce (Sauce Ecossaise)
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup cooking liquid from Morue a l'Anglaise (see recipe)
Freshly ground pepper to taste, preferably white pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a saucepan and add the flour, stirring with a wire whisk. When blended and smooth, add the cooking liquid, stirring rapidly with the whisk. When thickened and smooth, add the cream, stirring. Add salt, pepper, nutmeg and cayenne. Simmer, stirring often, about five minutes. Stir in the egg and serve.
